DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify existence bacterial and/or fungal contamination different technics propofol without EDTA continuous infusion patient undergo general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Bacterial Fungal Contamination During Propofol Continuous Infusion
DOC.criteria: Age eighteen year old ASA Physiological Status P1 ou P2 Patients undergoing clean procedure general anesthesia . Patients eighteen year old ASA Physiological Status P3 , P4 P5 Current infectious process
